name: Little Blue's Mind Maze
description:
BUGS

There's a bug on first level. Npc can spawn at the top of your head, and game just start on game over.

And for last maze, there's only 9 papers instead of 10. (JuanLr: Sorry about that.)

  • History

Little Blue's doing  his final school exam and you need to help him remember where do he stored the test answers inside his mind, while he needs to deal with his own anxiety that keeps pushing him backwards!! Can you figure out the right path to remember that answers?

  • Game

Maze game play. You need to find all the 'test' itens and the maze way out;

Clock itens is your life. You lose one clock every time you hit one npc.

  • Controls

Movement: WASD/Arrows

  • Credits

Art: JuanLr

Level Design: Alok, JuanLr

Programming: Alok

Music: orangefreesounds
